headline: Equifax Announces Acquisition of Vault Verify
summary: Equifax® (NYSE: EFX) today announced that it has completed the acquisition of Vault Verify, a provider of human resources services, including employment and income verification services. This acquisition enhances the data that Equifax provides to verifiers to help them make more informed decisions in less time. It also provides another mechanism for employers to provide data to a verifications provider, expanding options available to Equifax employer clients. Vault Verify complements The Work Nu

raw.headline: Equifax Announces Acquisition of Vault Verify
raw.summary: Equifax® (NYSE: EFX) today announced that it has completed the acquisition of Vault Verify, a provider of human resources services, including employment and income verification services. This acquisition enhances the data that Equifax provides to verifiers to help them make more informed decisions in less time. It also provides another mechanism for employers to provide data to a verifications provider, expanding options available to Equifax employer clients. Vault Verify complements The Work Nu
